name: A1-01
description:
A Living Artifact Survives on Vernacular Abstractions from varying Lessons on Ludonometry ('The Design of Play').

"RUNNINGOUTOFSPACE, TRIGONOUSFPNUANCE, INGOTSUPONFURNACE, One amongst the three are rendered true. The theme is not a dream, it's all up to you.."

Objective:

Land on Golden Tiles to accumulate Points (+1); Copper will Negate Points (-2) and will dissolve the platform to your doom. Get as Much Points from Stochastic ally & Successfully Landing on the desired tiles before Timer Runs Out.

Controls:

  • Space - Jump 
  • Ctrl - Toggle Camera Perspective Between [1st] and [3rd] person perspective..
  • R - Restart During Game.. 

[WIP]
